meanings.definition: A stage in the life cycle of a jellyfish where it is attached to a surface and has a cylindrical shape.
meanings.sent1: The scyphistomas of the jellyfish were firmly stuck to the rock.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the scyphistomas to understand jellyfish development.
meanings.sent3: The scyphistomas decided to have a race to see who could reach the bottom of the ocean first.
meanings.sent4: The scyphistomas stood tall like tiny towers in the sea.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the scyphistomas glowed softly in the water.

meanings.sent1: Many scyphistomas were found clinging to the reef.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed a tank full of scyphistomas.
meanings.sent3: The scyphistomas threw a party to celebrate their multiplication.
meanings.sent4: The scyphistomas filled the ocean like a constellation of stars.
meanings.sent5: Divers marveled at the beauty of the scyphistomas swaying gently in the current.
